atomic_tests.name: Enumerate all accounts (Local)
atomic_tests.description: Enumerate all accounts by copying /etc/passwd to another file

input_arguments.description: Path where captured results will be placed

executor.name: sh

input_arguments.description: Path where captured results will be placed
Path where captured results will be placed

dependencies.get_prereq_command: (which pkg && pkg install -y lsof)||(which yum && yum -y install lsof)||(which apt-get && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y lsof)

atomic_tests.name: Show if a user account has ever logged in remotely
atomic_tests.description: Show if a user account has ever logged in remotely

input_arguments.description: Path where captured results will be placed

dependencies.description: Check if lastlog command exists on the machine
dependencies.prereq_command: if [ -x "$(command -v lastlog)" ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi

atomic_tests.name: Enumerate users and groups
atomic_tests.description: Utilize groups and id to enumerate users and groups

atomic_tests.name: Enumerate users and groups
atomic_tests.description: Utilize local utilities to enumerate users and groups

executor.name: sh
executor.procedure:
dscl . list /Groups
dscl . list /Users
dscl . list /Users | grep -v '_'
dscacheutil -q group
dscacheutil -q user

atomic_tests.name: Enumerate all accounts on Windows (Local)
atomic_tests.description:
Enumerate all accounts
Upon execution, multiple enumeration commands will be run and their output displayed in the PowerShell session

executor.name: command_prompt
executor.procedure:
net user
dir c:\Users\
cmdkey.exe /list
net localgroup "Users"
net localgroup

atomic_tests.name: Enumerate all accounts via PowerShell (Local)
atomic_tests.description: Enumerate all accounts via PowerShell. Upon execution, lots of user account and group information will be displayed.

executor.name: powershell
executor.procedure:
net user
get-localuser
get-localgroupmember -group Users
cmdkey.exe /list
ls C:/Users
get-childitem C:\Users\
dir C:\Users\
get-localgroup
net localgroup

atomic_tests.name: Enumerate logged on users via CMD (Local)
atomic_tests.description: Enumerate logged on users. Upon execution, logged on users will be displayed.

atomic_tests.name: ESXi - Local Account Discovery via ESXCLI
atomic_tests.description:
An adversary can use ESXCLI to enumerate a list of all local accounts on an ESXi host.
[Reference](https://lolesxi-project.github.io/LOLESXi/lolesxi/Binaries/esxcli/#account%20enumeration)"

input_arguments.description: Specify the host name or IP of the ESXi server.
Specify the privilege user account on the ESXi server.
